meta.job_title: Domestic Tax Senior Associate, Partnership Tax

duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare federal, state, and local tax returns, and ensure compliance with tax code and regulations.
Handle partnership tax and domestic income tax matters, employing data analysis and automation technologies.
Analyze tax issues, perform tax planning, and manage tax-related complex financial reporting.
Experiment with and implement digitization solutions to optimize engagement and reduce hours in tax processes.
Ensure accuracy and quality in tax work, maintaining ethical and professional standards.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Accounting or Finance (Preferred)
